text: bahudaivavisvasinikale - avar visvasikkunnat vare ninnal vivaham kalikkarut‌. satyavisvasiniyaya oru atimastriyan bahudaivavisvasiniyekkal nallat‌. aval ninnalkk katukam janippiccalum sari. bahudaivavisvasikalkk avar visvasikkunnat vare ninnal vivaham kalippicc keatukkukayum ceyyarut‌. satyavisvasiyaya oru atimayan bahudaivavisvasiyekkal nallat‌. avan ninnalkk katukam janippiccalum sari. akkuttar narakattilekkan ksanikkunnat‌. allahuvakatte avanre hitamanusaricc svargattilekkum, papameacanattilekkum ksanikkunnu. janannal srad'dhicc manas'silakkuvan venti tanre telivukal avarkk vivariccukeatukkukayum ceyyunnu
